title: Lakshman Singh (golfer)
text: Lakshman Singh (born c.1952) is an Indian <a href="golf">golf</a>er who won the individual gold medal for India at <a href="Golf%20at%20the%201982%20Asian%20Games">1982 Asian Games</a>. He was awarded <a href="Arjuna%20Award">Arjuna Award</a> in 1982. He hails from <a href="Rajasthan">Rajasthan</a> state. His sons, <a href="Arjun%20Singh%20%28golfer%29">Arjun Singh</a> and Ranjit Singh have also represented India in golf. He is popularly known as Bunny Lakshman Singh.
